name: Agent Diplegia
description:
Play as the agent diplegia who lost control of half his body.

Help him exterminate all gang members in diferent locations to rest and complete his career.

he maybe lost controle of half his body but he can controll it again when holding the CTRL button.

you can eather walk and jump, or shoot and slow time. using CTRL key to t oggle between controle.

Enjoy.
